query:
SELECT s.id, s.site_number, s.description, sc.name as centre_name, uc.name as category_name
FROM sites s
LEFT JOIN shopping_centres sc ON s.centre_id = sc.id
LEFT JOIN site_usage_categories suc ON s.id = suc.site_id
LEFT JOIN usage_categories uc ON suc.category_id = uc.id
WHERE sc.name LIKE '%Eastgate%' AND s.site_number = '2'
ORDER BY s.id, uc.name;

LEFT JOIN site_usage_categories suc ON s.id = suc.site_id
LEFT JOIN usage_categories uc ON suc.category_id = uc.id
WHERE sc.name LIKE '%Eastgate%' AND s.site_number = '2'
ORDER BY s.id, uc.name;
